agents.airline_operating_centre.PassengerReallocation¶

class agents.airline_operating_centre.PassengerReallocation(agent)¶

Bases: Role

PR

Description: Decide how to manage connecting passengers when a flight has left. 1. Check passenger that should have been in the flight that has left and have missed their connection 2. Rebook them onto following flights to destination, compensate compute_missed_connecting_paxand return them to destination, pay for care, and potentially put them in hotels by checking preferences with passengers.

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.
